57444.「……おや 見ない顔だね。\n ぼくは サダク。旅の霊媒師だよ。:
Hm, I've never seen you around here before...
My name's Sadak. I'm a traveling medium.

57445.「きみは……普通の人とは\n 魂の色が ちょっとちがうね。\n ふむ。名前は……:
Hey, you... your soul is a slightly different
color than most people. Your name?

57446.「……そう。<pc>というのか。\n ぼくは 悪霊から この町を救うために来た。:
...I see. <pc>. I've come here to
save this town from evil spirits. Feel free
to ask me if you have any questions.

57447.「手紙……届けてきてくれたみたいね。\n 言わなくても 私には わかるの……。:
You delivered the letter, right? You don't
have to tell me. I already know...

57448.「……今日 <pc>さんが いらしたわ。\n ルコリアからの手紙を届けてくださっ:
Today, <pc> came to see me. They
brought a letter from Lucolia, but then talked
about something I didn't understand.

57449.「セレドの町が もうひとつあって\n そこで 私たちは\n 死んだことになってい:
Is there another Celed where we were supposed
to have died or something...?

57450.「ルコリアが 無事だとわかって\n 少し 安心できたけれど\n いったい どうい:
I'm more relieved now knowing that Lucolia is
safe, but what is going on...?

57451.「……あなたに返してもらった この日記帳ね。\n 読んでみたら 姉さんが死んだ後:
I read through this diary you gave me... and
it has entries dated after my sister's death.

57452.「……このきれいな字は 確かに 姉さんの字よ。\n 天国にいる姉さんの 書いたこ:
...This beautiful handwriting is definitely
my sister's. It's like her writing up from the
sky comes to life in this diary.

57453.「大人たちや 私が いなくなったこと。\n 使い魔のムッチーノや 魔人のこと。\:
The adults disappearing... Muccino and the
genie... and a traveler named <pc>.

57454.「あなたを試すつもりで お使いを頼んだけど……\n やっぱり あなたは 姉さんの:
I asked you for an errand to test you, but...
I really knew you could go to her. Please...
Tell me more about her.

57455.<pc>は 偽りのレンダーシアにある\nセレドの町で見てきたことを 説明した。:
<pc> described what they'd seen
in the Celed of the false Lendersia.

57456.「フィーロ ミザール ミラカ……。\n みんな あのガケ崩れで死んだ子たちだわ。:
Firo, Mizar, Miraka... they all died when
the church collapsed.

57457.「……あなたが行ったという セレドの町は\n 死んだ子供たちが 住んでいる町なの:
That other Celed... it's a town where those
dead children live, isn't it?

57458.「どういう理屈か わからないけど\n この日記さえあれば 私は ずっと\n 死ん:
I don't really understand how it works, but
with this diary I'll always have a connection
with my sister...

57459.「それがわかっただけでも よかったわ。\n これは 姉さんに\n 手紙を届けてく:
I'm glad I know that now. Please take this...
It's thanks for delivering that letter.
